🛡️ TrustLabs Badge Demo

📋 How to Use

Include the script and add badges to your HTML:

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/YOUR_USERNAME/trustlabs-badge-cdn@main/dist/badge-element.v1.js"></script>
<trustlabs-badge email="user@example.com"></trustlabs-badge>

🎯 Live Examples

Hover over the badges to see verification details:

john.doe@example.com
jane.smith@test.com
verified.user@company.com

⚙️ Attributes

  • email (required): Email address to verify
  • data-size: "sm" or "md" (default: "md")
  • data-theme: "auto", "light", or "dark" (default: "auto")

📞 Getting Started

  1. Register your domain with TrustLabs
  2. Include the script from the CDN
  3. Add badges using the <trustlabs-badge> element

Contact: support@trustlabs.com
